extendedInfo.description: CalenGoo is a calendar app that can sync with Android calendar and Google Calendar. It is designed to make it easier and faster to work with your calendar on your phone. Five different calendar views (day, week, month, agenda, landscape day) give you a good overview over your upcoming events. To make rescheduling events easy, they can be moved or copied via drag&drop in the day, week, month and landscape day view.If you have any problems please contact android@calengoo.com! (Please ensure that you are using the correct email, someone in the reviews said he didn't get an answer, but I re-checked my emails and I did not get any email from him.) To find the settings you have to press the menu button of your phone. If you cannot find that button, please see here: http://android.calengoo.com/menubuttonAdditional features:- Drag&Drop support to move, copy, open and delete events- Widgets to see your events on your home screen without opening the app: day widget (4x1, 4x2, 4x3), week widget (4x3, 4x4, 5x5), month widget (4x3, 4x4, 5x5) and agenda widget (different sizes from 2x1 up to 5x5). In the month 4x4 widget you can tap a single day to directly open it. The agenda widgets can be (optionally) scrollable (but under Android 2.x this requires a special home screen manager).- Zoomable month view- Configurable startup view (day, view, month, agenda)- When adding recurring events you can use the same rules that you can use in Google Calendar, e.g. you can create events "on Monday and Thursday every two weeks" or "every last Friday in a month".- Direct sync with Google Calendar option e.g. to download all historical data and to be able to assign icons to events- Predefined and custom icons can be assigned when syncing directly ( http://android.calengoo.com/icons )- Improved date picker that displays a whole month to choose a date- Improved time picker with three different ways to enter a time- Search function (with optional advanced options like "Whole words" and "Case sensitive")- Customizable hardware buttons (e.g. you can assign the "Today" function to the "back" button)- Sync with Google Tasks- Many configuration options to change the way the app looks and works.- Repeatable, snooze-able reminders using a custom sound (e.g. an MP3 file from your phone) or one of the built-in sounds. You can choose a different sound for each calendar.- The birthdays and anniversaries of your contacts can be displayed ( http://android.calengoo.com/birthdays )- Events can be sent as SMS or email. When sending them as email an ICS file is attached that the recipient can use to import the event into his own calendar.- Functions to export/import entire calendars as ICS files.- Completable events and floating events ( http://android.calengoo.com/completable )- Templates to quickly create often used events. Templates can also be combined.- Print function (to print the day, month, agenda or landscape day view into a PDF file)- Support for Google's event colors (you have to sync via OAuth2 to use this, just add your Google account under "Settings", "Accounts", "Add account", "OAuth2 Login" in CalenGoo).For more details please see here: http://android.calengoo.comAnd if you have any problems, suggestions or questions please send an email to android@calengoo.com .Additionally you can add ideas or vote for ideas on http://calengooandroid.uservoice.com

reviews.title: Absolute best!
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t live without it. Best features are the diary style week view option (as opposed to only the vertical columns found on most cal app week views) and the month view that is actually readable! Love that it\'s constantly being improved. Thanks you developer!
reviews.author: Debbie Rose

reviews.title: Help!
reviews.comment: Can\'t live without this app bit since I got new Samsung Galaxy 4S syncing is inconsistent & unreliable.  Desperaly need help!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeper!
reviews.comment: Been using versions of this for years now.  Paid for it on my IPhone, and when I switched over to Android, was the only paid app I immediately d/l.  Still having issues with integrated task management, but that may be more to do with how Google has set up tasks.  I even put this on my husband\'s phone, since he is clueless about time management.  Now, if I could only get him to actually use it.....
reviews.author: Glory Ray

reviews.title: Simply the best
reviews.comment: Able to sync with Google calendar and outlook without a fuss.
reviews.author: Ahmad Fauzi Mohd Shariff

reviews.title: Easily the best cal app
reviews.comment: Functionally suits my needs perfectly, only app that can sync my g-calendar beyond 6 months ago (to 2009), just wish it was as smooth as business calendar & could do with improving the ui on the event details and settings screens, using on note2 is still very laggy when scrolling, 5 stars when fixed. Many thanks
reviews.author: Kam M

reviews.title: The absolute BEST
reviews.comment: I originally got this for free via Amazon App Store. It is so good that I felt guilty, so I deleted and bought thru Google Play. I own paid copies of all the calendar apps, and this is hands down THE BEST. This is the only calendar that let\'s you drag and drop copy/move events - and also calculates the age of annual reoccurring events. Look no farther!
reviews.author: Rick Kittredge

reviews.title: Great for former Palm users
reviews.comment: Excellent Calendar app that syncs my Google calendar all the way back to 2001! Still fast despite twelve years of entries.  It took a while to customize to how I want, but that\'s because there are tons of options available.
reviews.author: Robert Simpson

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.comment: This is simply the best calendar app available for android. It\'s the only calendar app that has been able to sync all of my Google calendar events (which go back 7 years) without having to set up Exchange Activesync. Syncs are fast. Customisability is extensive. Developer implements feature requests. Forget Business Calendar, Pocket Informant etc. Buy Calengoo first because you won\'t end wasting your money on other inferior apps.
reviews.author: Sam Aitcheson

reviews.comment: Great app, developer responds quickly and continues to enhance and update.\t(Updated August 2013) I\'ve looked at many different calendar apps on Android and this is the first one that I\'ve really been happy with. Having used it for well over a year now I find that it works very well; the easy integration of tasks and calendar is a definite plus. Even better, the developer takes support very seriously, demonstrating an ongoing commitment to tweaks, bug fixes, and integrating new suggestions for the UI and functionality. Definitely worth the purchase price for the support alone!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great app! Finally able to use my calendar to the fullest extent! On my Atrix HD the calendar widget keeps disappearing. Same on my wifes phone (also an Atrix HD). App is installed to internal storage. Any help would be great.
reviews.author: Earl The Grey

reviews.title: Task List Widget
reviews.comment: Love your app & widget. Task List - could you please add a Sort by Pending /Due Date (ascending).  Thanks   Update: Received an email this am. My request for a new sort has been added! Thats fast response! Sort checks out as requested - in development version of apk. Many thanks! 2nd update: Fantastic response from developer - fixed Task Widget for HC v3.2.1.   Now I can have my task widget and calendar widget side by side on the same screen. Many thanks!
reviews.author: Dick Koob

reviews.title: Worth ten times its asking price!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using calengoo for some time now and am still very  impressed, I pretty well run my life with it. It is without a doubt one of the best android apps available! Dev is extremely helpful and is constantly improving this app. Buy this app now - you won\'t regret it!   To the whiney users complaining of widgets disappearing on reboot  move the app back from sd-card!  To anyone who has any issues whatsoever, try emailing the dev instead of bitching on here.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very happy
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using Calengoo for quite a while - I have to say I\'m very happy with this product. It may not be the cheapest out there but the stability, reliability and compatibility with Google Calendars makes it well worth it. Easy to update and add new agendas on the move which is perfect for my line of work. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Marius Zulgis

reviews.title: Best calendar app ever!!!
reviews.comment: Have used this for 4 years now with my mobile grooming service. The couple of times I had a problem were due to my error and Dominique walked me through top fix each time.
reviews.author: Carol Shannon

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great calendar to use with your Google calendar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excelent!
reviews.comment: Does what it says very well! Wish other apps worked as well... Sigh... One day...
reviews.author: Andrei Goga

reviews.title: Very nice app.
reviews.comment: I tried several other calendar apps, and I find this one to be the best.
reviews.author: Otto Kottler

reviews.title: Flawless Calendar App
reviews.comment: Works great, always updated. Been using CalenGoo for well over a year and haven\'t yet had a problem with it.
reviews.author: Matthew Schock

reviews.title: Still isn\'t fixed.
reviews.comment: Excellent calendar.  Except it will sometimes show less than all lines in a week view entry.  Sometimes one line, or two, or three... who can guess, you never know.  It\'s a huge problem to have info randomly cut out of view.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super Kalender
reviews.comment: Der Kalender ist sehr gut. Leider hat er Performanceprobleme wenn mehrere Kalender angezeigt werden. Dann hat er M\303\274he mit dem scrolling.
reviews.author: Gerhard Imhof
